channel.title: Gaurdian blade -- AQ to runescape conversion - (showoff) [v2 added]
channel.description:
third conversion - guardian blade picture:
[img]http://www.aqworldswiki.com/images/9/97/PreviewGuardianBlade.PNG[/img]
My pictures 3d models:
[IMG]http://up2share.com/file/jtzb2af9z_HB.bmp[/img]
With character
[IMG]http://up2share.com/file/nj6zffaa5_GBwp.bmp[/img]
Please rate... and i may release with the other aq converions[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2009, 04:01:16 pm[/size][hr]if you wanna see wired view or to see if it has a sharp edge just ask me for anouther view
here s a v2... i changed a bit of stuff and fixed it up a bit
[IMG]http://up2share.com/file/yz7wtv468_v2.bmp[/img]

@lost72 wrote:

[quote=“Razik-Blaze, post:1, topic:297243”]off topic/ ZOMFG NEVER!!!
on topic/ Looks cool. Try spending more time smoothing edges as you can see its a bit “sloppy”. And aq is easy to hack :o[/quote]
If you have any problems with this sword y dont you make 1?! >.<
[/quote]

You messed up you’re quote… I’m just trying to give some helpful advise.
